name: Spring Cleaning (BoschyBee)
description:
Welcome to Minimalist Incorporated LLC, Valued Employee! Open your work window by pressing the button on the taskbar, and double click underlined files to open them.

We hope you enjoy our short game about deleting files to minimize the amount of junk on your PC. Have fun! :)

(Download the builds below for the best experience)

VGDC at UMN Winter 2023 Game Jam Game

Theme: Minimalism

Jam Length: 48hrs
